trans-unit.source: Query Tables
trans-unit.target: Query Tables

trans-unit.source: Query Tables
trans-unit.target: Query Tables

trans-unit.source: The <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Query Tables</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation returns a list of tables under the specified account.
trans-unit.target: The <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Query Tables</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation returns a list of tables under the specified account.

trans-unit.source: Request
trans-unit.target: Request

trans-unit.source: The <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Query Tables</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> request may be constructed as follows.
trans-unit.target: The <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Query Tables</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> request may be constructed as follows.

trans-unit.source: HTTPS is recommended.
trans-unit.target: HTTPS is recommended.

trans-unit.source: Replace <placeholder>myaccount</placeholder> with the name of your storage account:
trans-unit.target: Replace <placeholder>myaccount</placeholder> with the name of your storage account:

trans-unit.source: Method
trans-unit.target: Method

trans-unit.source: Request URI
trans-unit.target: Request URI

trans-unit.source: HTTP Version
trans-unit.target: HTTP Version

trans-unit.source: HTTP/1.1
trans-unit.target: HTTP/1.1

trans-unit.source: Emulated Storage Service URI
trans-unit.target: Emulated Storage Service URI

trans-unit.source: When making a request against the emulated storage service, specify the emulator hostname and Table service port as <codeInline>127.0.0.1:10002</codeInline>, followed by the emulated storage account name:
trans-unit.target: When making a request against the emulated storage service, specify the emulator hostname and Table service port as <codeInline>127.0.0.1:10002</codeInline>, followed by the emulated storage account name:

trans-unit.source: Method
trans-unit.target: Method

trans-unit.source: Request URI
trans-unit.target: Request URI

trans-unit.source: HTTP Version
trans-unit.target: HTTP Version

trans-unit.source: HTTP/1.1
trans-unit.target: HTTP/1.1

trans-unit.source: The Table service in the emulated storage service differs from the Windows® Azure™ Table service in several ways.
trans-unit.target: The Table service in the emulated storage service differs from the Windows® Azure™ Table service in several ways.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <legacyLink xlink:href="c60f2090-c0f4-4817-8559-e98786461dbe" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Differences Between the Storage Emulator and Azure Storage Services</legacyLink>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <legacyLink xlink:href="c60f2090-c0f4-4817-8559-e98786461dbe" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Differences Between the Storage Emulator and Azure Storage Services</legacyLink>.

trans-unit.source: URI Parameters
trans-unit.target: URI Parameters

trans-unit.source: The <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Query Tables</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation supports the query options defined by the OData Protocol Specification.
trans-unit.target: The <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Query Tables</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation supports the query options defined by the OData Protocol Specification.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <externalLink><linkText>OData Protocol</linkText><linkUri>http://www.odata.org/</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <externalLink><linkText>OData Protocol</linkText><linkUri>http://www.odata.org/</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.target: Request Headers

trans-unit.target: The following table describes required and optional request headers.

trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.target: Specifies the authentication scheme, account name, and signature.

trans-unit.target: <parameterReference>Date</parameterReference> or <parameterReference>x-ms-date</parameterReference>

trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.target: Specifies the accepted content type of the response payload.

trans-unit.source: Possible values are:
trans-unit.target: Possible values are:

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: Provides a client-generated, opaque value with a 1 KB character limit that is recorded in the analytics logs when storage analytics logging is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Provides a client-generated, opaque value with a 1 KB character limit that is recorded in the analytics logs when storage analytics logging is enabled.

trans-unit.source: Using this header is highly recommended for correlating client-side activities with requests received by the server.
trans-unit.target: Using this header is highly recommended for correlating client-side activities with requests received by the server.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="1727932c-8a3b-4502-86ac-c89931d54bac" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">About Storage Analytics Logging</link> and <externalLink><linkText>Windows Azure Logging: Using Logs to Track Storage Requests</linkText><linkUri>http://blogs.msdn.com/b/windowsazurestorage/archive/2011/08/03/windows-azure-storage-logging-using-logs-to-track-storage-requests.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: Request Body
trans-unit.target: Request Body

trans-unit.source: None.
trans-unit.target: None.

trans-unit.source: Response
trans-unit.target: Response

trans-unit.source: The response includes an HTTP status code, a set of response headers, and a response body.
trans-unit.target: The response includes an HTTP status code, a set of response headers, and a response body.

trans-unit.source: Status Code
trans-unit.target: Status Code

trans-unit.source: A successful operation returns status code 200 (OK).
trans-unit.target: A successful operation returns status code 200 (OK).

trans-unit.source: For information about status codes, see <link xlink:href="4421ac96-38eb-4ea3-8104-f9975c3bf153" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Status and Error Codes</link> and <link xlink:href="a34b70ea-3b69-406e-9b1e-660358d997a3" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Table Storage Error Codes</link>.
trans-unit.target: For information about status codes, see <link xlink:href="4421ac96-38eb-4ea3-8104-f9975c3bf153" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Status and Error Codes</link> and <link xlink:href="a34b70ea-3b69-406e-9b1e-660358d997a3" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Table Storage Error Codes</link>.

trans-unit.source: Response Headers
trans-unit.target: Response Headers

trans-unit.source: The response for this operation includes the following headers.
trans-unit.target: The response for this operation includes the following headers.

trans-unit.source: The response may also include additional standard HTTP headers.
trans-unit.target: The response may also include additional standard HTTP headers.

trans-unit.source: All standard headers conform to the <externalLink><linkText>HTTP/1.1 protocol specification</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=150478</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: All standard headers conform to the <externalLink><linkText>HTTP/1.1 protocol specification</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=150478</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: Response header
trans-unit.target: Response header

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: If the number of tables to be returned exceeds 1,000 or the query does not complete within the timeout interval, the response header includes the <parameterReference>x-ms-continuation-NextTableName</parameterReference> continuation header.
trans-unit.target: If the number of tables to be returned exceeds 1,000 or the query does not complete within the timeout interval, the response header includes the <parameterReference>x-ms-continuation-NextTableName</parameterReference> continuation header.

trans-unit.source: This header returns the continuation token value.
trans-unit.target: This header returns the continuation token value.

trans-unit.source: For more information about using the continuation token, see <link xlink:href="d962e4c0-709a-4f04-a296-32a49d82c799" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Query Timeout and Pagination</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information about using the continuation token, see <link xlink:href="d962e4c0-709a-4f04-a296-32a49d82c799" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Query Timeout and Pagination</link>.

trans-unit.source: This header uniquely identifies the request that was made and can be used for troubleshooting the request.
trans-unit.target: This header uniquely identifies the request that was made and can be used for troubleshooting the request.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="b20a45d8-7453-487c-b492-69dc5a5b6d2d" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Troubleshooting API Operations</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="b20a45d8-7453-487c-b492-69dc5a5b6d2d" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Troubleshooting API Operations</link>.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the version of the Table service used to execute the request.
trans-unit.target: Indicates the version of the Table service used to execute the request.

trans-unit.source: This header is returned for requests made against version 2009-09-19 and later.
trans-unit.target: This header is returned for requests made against version 2009-09-19 and later.

trans-unit.source: A UTC date/time value generated by the service that indicates the time at which the response was initiated.
trans-unit.target: A UTC date/time value generated by the service that indicates the time at which the response was initiated.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the content type of the payload.
trans-unit.target: Indicates the content type of the payload.

trans-unit.source: Value depends on the request <parameterReference>Accept</parameterReference> header.
trans-unit.target: Value depends on the request <parameterReference>Accept</parameterReference> header.

trans-unit.source: Possible values are:
trans-unit.target: Possible values are:

trans-unit.source: For more formation about valid content types, see <link xlink:href="9f1dce4a-d528-40ec-a5a4-fd93f9ee4c5e" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Payload Format for Table Service Operations</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more formation about valid content types, see <link xlink:href="9f1dce4a-d528-40ec-a5a4-fd93f9ee4c5e" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Payload Format for Table Service Operations</link>.

trans-unit.source: Response Body
trans-unit.target: Response Body

trans-unit.source: The <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Query Tables</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation returns the list of tables in the account as an OData entity set.
trans-unit.target: The <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Query Tables</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation returns the list of tables in the account as an OData entity set.

trans-unit.source: According to the value of the <parameterReference>Accept</parameterReference> header the content is either an Atom feed or JSON.
trans-unit.target: According to the value of the <parameterReference>Accept</parameterReference> header the content is either an Atom feed or JSON.

trans-unit.source: Atom Feed
trans-unit.target: Atom Feed

trans-unit.source: Here is a sample Atom response body for the <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Query Tables</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation.
trans-unit.target: Here is a sample Atom response body for the <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Query Tables</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation.

trans-unit.source: JSON
trans-unit.target: JSON

trans-unit.source: Here is a sample JSON response body for the <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Query Tables</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operations.
trans-unit.target: Here is a sample JSON response body for the <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Query Tables</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operations.

trans-unit.source: Full Metadata
trans-unit.target: Full Metadata

trans-unit.source: Minimal Metadata
trans-unit.target: Minimal Metadata

trans-unit.source: No Metadata
trans-unit.target: No Metadata

trans-unit.source: Authorization
trans-unit.target: Authorization

trans-unit.source: Only the account owner may call this operation.
trans-unit.target: Only the account owner may call this operation.

trans-unit.source: A query against the Table service may return a maximum of 1,000 tables at one time and may execute for a maximum of five seconds.
trans-unit.target: A query against the Table service may return a maximum of 1,000 tables at one time and may execute for a maximum of five seconds.

trans-unit.source: If the result set contains more than 1,000 tables, if the query did not complete within five seconds, or if the query crosses the partition boundary, the response includes a custom header containing the <parameterReference>x-ms-continuation-NextTableName</parameterReference> continuation token.
trans-unit.target: If the result set contains more than 1,000 tables, if the query did not complete within five seconds, or if the query crosses the partition boundary, the response includes a custom header containing the <parameterReference>x-ms-continuation-NextTableName</parameterReference> continuation token.

trans-unit.source: The continuation token may be used to construct a subsequent request for the next page of data.
trans-unit.target: The continuation token may be used to construct a subsequent request for the next page of data.

trans-unit.source: For more information about continuation tokens, see <link xlink:href="d962e4c0-709a-4f04-a296-32a49d82c799" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Query Timeout and Pagination</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information about continuation tokens, see <link xlink:href="d962e4c0-709a-4f04-a296-32a49d82c799" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Query Timeout and Pagination</link>.

trans-unit.source: Note that the total time allotted to the request for scheduling and processing the query is 30 seconds, including the five seconds for query execution.
trans-unit.target: Note that the total time allotted to the request for scheduling and processing the query is 30 seconds, including the five seconds for query execution.

trans-unit.source: For more information about supported query operations against the Table service through LINQ, see <link xlink:href="de258a1e-4101-4443-88cb-f9d156f04246" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Query Operators (Table Storage Support)</link> and <link xlink:href="c1ff6980-6c93-4327-9d19-69790370e1ee" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Writing LINQ Queries</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information about supported query operations against the Table service through LINQ, see <link xlink:href="de258a1e-4101-4443-88cb-f9d156f04246" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Query Operators (Table Storage Support)</link> and <link xlink:href="c1ff6980-6c93-4327-9d19-69790370e1ee" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Writing LINQ Queries</link>.
